title: WhatsApp
description: WhatsApp, a leading social messaging app, utilizes a set of vibrant colors that resonate with its recognizable brand identity. The primary hues include rich greens like '#075E54' and '#128C7E', which are complemented by energetic tones like '#25D366' and '#DCF8C6'. This harmonious blend is sourced from the official brand guidelines available at 'http://www.whatsappbrand.com/'.
